column1: marriage_interaction.0001.desc.end0:"I apologize for any inconveniences my decision will cause and sincerely hope it will not damage the relations between our families."

column3: \n\nI have reached the conclusion that your pending marriage to [rejected_betrothed.GetTitledFirstName] is not in the best interest of yourself or our family. Thus
column4: I have decided to break the betrothal. #<TO_REMOVE>"

column1: #Timeout notification when you are in charge of the betrothal of someone else:""

column3: until it came time to conclude the marriage. With both parts seemingly content to pretend the arrangement was never made
column4: it seems unlikely that [betrothed_1.GetTitledFirstName] and [betrothed_2.GetTitledFirstName] will ever married."

column1: #Timeout notification for a betrothed when someone else is in charge of marrying them:""
marriage_interaction.0005.desc0:"Despite the negotiation and careful planning
column2: it seems that I will never be married to my betrothed
column3: [other_betrothed.GetTitledFirstName]. Despite the fact that the time has come to fulfill the promised marriage
column4: neither party has taken the step to conclude the agreement."

column1: marriage_interaction.0005.a0:"Who knows who I will be married to now."

column1: marriage_interaction.0008.desc0:"[betrothed_clergy.GetTitledFirstName] has devoted [betrothed_clergy.GetHerHis] life to [betrothed_clergy.GetFaith.HighGodName] – despite the negotiation and careful planning
column2: it seems that [betrothed_clergy.GetSheHe] will never marry [betrothed_2.GetTitledFirstName].

column1: marriage_interaction.0009.desc_clergy0:"Now that I have devoted my life to [betrothed_clergy.GetFaith.HighGodName] I am forbidden to marry and must leave my betrothed [betrothed_2.GetTitledFirstName] behind. I hope [betrothed_2.GetSheHe] will forgive me."

column2: it seems that I will never marry my betrothed."
